short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes news feed from LinkedIn home page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximize your LinkedIn productivity with the LinkedIn Feed Remover extension. By eliminating the news feed from your homepage, this tool helps you stay laser-focused on networking, opportunities, and meaningful content. Enjoy a streamlined experience that preserves all LinkedIn features while decluttering your view. Reclaim your time and elevate your efficiency with the LinkedIn Feed Remover extension.
